metadata.name: Drawn Runner Special - "The Rescue of Runner 106"
metadata.description:
This Drawn Runner is a special piece. The story behind it is one of woe, so do not try to contain your tears. Runner 106, the sole Runner in possession of the artist, was stolen and sold. She was passed between several pitiless bots when her turmoil was spotten by Artisan. 

Artisan quickly liquidated three of their Runners (4178, 7070 & 8718) to raise the funds that matched the price the bots had attached to 106's head. Artisan then endeavoured to return 106 to the artist.

This piece depicts the titanic strength and fortitude of Runner 9327, avatar of Artisan, as he brings Runner 106 to safety. Artisan's former Runners look on, as do the avatars of Dozer, Mid and BowTiedBonobo.  
  
The piece was painted in watercolour, ink and gouache with digital shading. It was minted with the intent to be sold by PartyBid to regain the losses that Artisan incurred during the rescue.

All original Chain Runner designs are by BrainDraind and are licensed under CC0. This Drawn Runner special piece was minted by Ticklish in May 2022. It includes unlockable photos of the process by which it was made.
